Html:
Hi,

   I had developed one web app which uses google map which needs Google Map API key to open google map on web page.

   But, when i try to open the same web page on different machine, it is asking Google Map API key again.

  Can you please let me know how to use one common key through which i can open the web page which has google map on any mahcine?

Thanks&Regards,
Sandhya.
use gmap.net control, it use direct access to maps and don't need any keys ;}
